title: Two Papers Accepted by NeurIPS'25
content: Two co-authored papers was accepted by NeurIPS'25 (one spotlight), congratulations!

title: CityUHK OAPA Scholarship Award
content: I was awarded the Outstanding Academic Performance Award (OAPA) Scholarship by City University of Hong Kong!

title: Paper Accepted by IEEE GLOBECOM'25
content: One co-authored paper entitled "Task-Aware Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning of Large Pre-Trained Models at the Edge" has been accepted by IEEE GLOBECOM'25!

title: Paper Accepted by IEEE JSAC
content: One co-authored paper entitled "R-ACP: Real-Time Adaptive Collaborative Perception Leveraging Robust Task-Oriented Communications" has been accepted by IEEE JSAC!

title: IEEE RAS Student Grant Award

title: One Paper Accepted by ICRA'25
